,,, 2.4GHz 256 QAM LNA Module;Skyworks;SKY65971-11;;3; ,,, 5GHz WLAN Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY85405;;3; ,,, 5GHz 802.11ac LNA Module;Skyworks;SKY65981-11;;3; ,,, 2.4GHz Bluetooth Radio Chip;Atheros;AR3012-BL3D;;1; ,,, SoC Network Co-Processor for ZigBee;Silicon Labs;EM3581;;1; ,,, 2.4GHz ZigBee/Smart Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY66109-1;;1; ,,, Trusted Platform Module;Infineon;SLB9615;;1; |flags=Bluetooth 4.0, ZigBee, speaker |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} :<small>'''1300''' Mbps 3-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :'''600''' Mbps max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''1900 Mbps'' class'''</small> ---- {{TagLine|ASUS OnHub Dual-band Wireless-AC1900 Smart Router}} :[http://www.asus.com/Networking/OnHub-SRT-AC1900/ Product page] (OnHub SRT-AC1900) {{â€¢}} [https://on.google.com/hub/support Google OnHub Support]
"ASUS RT-AC60U", "REV.1.20" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :2 boards (Wi-Fi and Main)
*''ASUS SRT-AC1900 Wireless Smart Router'' :Model: SRT-AC1900 H/W Ver: A :*Setup network: Setup0A34 :*Setup code: pttmmbwmm
See also [[TP-LINK TGR1900 (Google OnHub)]].. [https://on.google.com/hub/#specs Google OnHub Spec]
{{FCC ST|11/26/2015|imdexme.}} <!--*[https://lede-project.org/toh/hwdata/asus/asus_srt-ac1900_a ''Asus SRT-AC1900'' on '''LEDE Project'''] ([https://lede-project.org/toh/hwdata/asus/start HW Data])-->
===News=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32868-asus-onhub-router-launched ''ASUS OnHub Router Launched'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://googleblog.blogspot.ru/2015/10/more-ways-to-wi-fi-with-new-asus-onhub.html ''More ways to Wi-Fi with the new ASUS OnHub'' on '''GoogleBlog'''] *[http://www.asus.com/us/News/21L1ulvOKFo77SmA ''ASUS and Google Announce the OnHub SRT-AC1900 Router'' on '''ASUS (US)'''] *[http://www.tomshardware.com/news/asus-google-onhub-ac1900-router,30424.html ''Asus Google AC1900 OnHub Router for the Smart Home'' on '''TomsHardware''']
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32889-asus-google-onhub-reviewed ''ASUS Google OnHub Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/OnHub+Teardown/48129 ''Teardown Google OnHub'' on '''iFixit''']
===Specifications=== *Processor: Qualcomm IPQ8064 @ 1.4 GHz Dual-core *Flash: 4GB (eMMC), 8MB (NOR), Memory: 1GB (DDR3) *Radio: QCA9880 3x3 (2.4GHz), QCA9880 3x3 (5GHz) :Congestion Sensing Radio: QCA9882 1x1 (2.4/5GHz) *Operating frequency: Simultaneous Dual-band 2.4/5GHz *Wireless support: 802.11a/b/g/n/ac Wi-Fi AC1900 :Bluetooth Smart Ready, Weave ready, 802.15.4 ready *Antenna: 1x Zigbee antenna, 1x Bluetooth antenna, :7x Smart high-performance internal Wi-Fi antennas *Switch: Qualcomm Atheros QCA8337 (GbE) *Wired support: 1x GbE WAN, 1x GbE LAN port *Lighting: Subtle lighting on the base (tri-color LED) :Proximity Sensor, Speaker, TPM (trusted boot) *Dimensions: 132 mm x 127 mm x 200 mm (WxDxH) *Weight: 800 g *Color: Slate Gray
===Features=== *Intelligent internal antenna array pushes 802.11ac Wi-Fi speeds up to 1900Mbps *ASUS Wave Control lets prioritize traffic to devices with a wave of your hand *Smart high-performance internal antennas, selected power amplifiers and fine- :tuned radio frequency design deliver wide wireless coverage in any direction *Congestion-sensing antenna for the least-crowded channel to Wi-Fi performance *Firmware is automatically updated with the latest features and security upgrades *The Google On app for Android and iOS allows simple setup and management
__NOTOC__
